name: Bits and Gits of EnCollab
tagline: All the information and docs that you will need to set up and run for the Encollab
body:
### Processor
Preferably preferably (Core i5 3rd Generation or higher)

### Communication

* __#Slack__ can be access in __three__ ways
    1. Browser
    2. Desktop Apps
       * Mac
       * Windows
       * Linux
    3. Mobile Apps
       * iOS
       * Android
       * Windows Phone
* __Good things about _#Slack_ is:
  * when you are added to the Channel (i.e. Chat group), you can see the history of the conversation when the channel was first started. (thumb up)
  * When you enabled the push notification on your mobile device, it automatically disabled the e-mail notification. (very convenience logic)

### Source Codes Control (Git on GitHub)

1. Open the account on <https://github.com/>
2. Download the GitHub Desktop version for easier access
3. Acquire access to __Encollab__ Repositories from _Graham R_.
4. Learning the Git Terms
   * Go to <https://help.github.com/articles/github-glossary/#git>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
